pubspec.name: gg_check
pubspec.description: Offers pre-commit checks like analyzing, linting, tests and coverage.

sections.title: Follow Dart file conventions
sections.summary:
### [*] 10/10 points: Provide a valid `pubspec.yaml`


### [*] 5/5 points: Provide a valid `README.md`

sections.title: Provide documentation
sections.summary:
### [*] 10/10 points: 20% or more of the public API has dartdoc comments

6 out of 7 API elements (85.7 %) have documentation comments.

Some symbols that are missing documentation: `gg_check`.

### [*] 10/10 points: Package has an example

sections.title: Platform support
sections.summary:
### [*] 20/20 points: Supports 5 of 6 possible platforms (**iOS**, **Android**, Web, **Windows**, **macOS**, **Linux**)

* ✓ Android
* ✓ iOS
* ✓ Windows
* ✓ Linux
* ✓ macOS

These platforms are not supported:

<details>
<summary>
Package not compatible with platform Web
</summary>

Because:
* `package:gg_check/gg_check.dart` that imports:
* `package:gg_check/src/gg_check.dart` that imports:
* `package:gg_check/src/tools/is_github.dart` that imports:
* `dart:io`
</details>

sections.title: Pass static analysis
sections.summary: ### [*] 50/50 points: code has no errors, warnings, lints, or formatting issues

sections.title: Support up-to-date dependencies
sections.summary:
### [*] 10/10 points: All of the package dependencies are supported in the latest version

|Package|Constraint|Compatible|Latest|
|:-|:-|:-|:-|
|[`args`]|`^2.4.2`|2.4.2|2.4.2|
|[`collection`]|`^1.18.0`|1.18.0|1.18.0|
|[`colorize`]|`^3.0.0`|3.0.0|3.0.0|
|[`dart_ping`]|`^9.0.1`|9.0.1|9.0.1|
|[`path`]|`^1.8.0`|1.9.0|1.9.0|
|[`recase`]|`^4.1.0`|4.1.0|4.1.0|
|[`yaml`]|`^3.1.2`|3.1.2|3.1.2|

<details><summary>Transitive dependencies</summary>

|Package|Constraint|Compatible|Latest|
|:-|:-|:-|:-|
|[`async`]|-|2.11.0|2.11.0|
|[`meta`]|-|1.12.0|1.12.0|
|[`source_span`]|-|1.10.0|1.10.0|
|[`string_scanner`]|-|1.2.0|1.2.0|
|[`term_glyph`]|-|1.2.1|1.2.1|
</details>

To reproduce run `dart pub outdated --no-dev-dependencies --up-to-date --no-dependency-overrides`.

[`args`]: https://pub.dev/packages/args
[`collection`]: https://pub.dev/packages/collection
[`colorize`]: https://pub.dev/packages/colorize
[`dart_ping`]: https://pub.dev/packages/dart_ping
[`path`]: https://pub.dev/packages/path
[`recase`]: https://pub.dev/packages/recase
[`yaml`]: https://pub.dev/packages/yaml
[`async`]: https://pub.dev/packages/async
[`meta`]: https://pub.dev/packages/meta
[`source_span`]: https://pub.dev/packages/source_span
[`string_scanner`]: https://pub.dev/packages/string_scanner
[`term_glyph`]: https://pub.dev/packages/term_glyph


### [*] 10/10 points: Package supports latest stable Dart and Flutter SDKs
